metadata.title: CVE-2019-2214 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: In binder_transaction of binder.c, there is a possible out of bounds writedue to a missing bounds check. This could lead to local escalation ofprivilege with no additional execution privileges needed. User interactionis not needed for exploitation.Product: AndroidVersions: AndroidkernelAndroid ID: A-136210786References: Upstream kernel

criterions.comment: linux: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
